title: Manage Shipping Demurrage Claim
description: A vessel chartered to deliver crude oil was delayed from unloading at the terminal. The shipowner submits a demurrage claim for the extra time.

tasks.description: Receive the demurrage claim and the vessel's statement of facts, which details the timeline of its arrival and delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: The claim documents are received and logged.

tasks.description: Compare the vessel's statement of facts with the terminal's own activity logs to verify the delay times.
tasks.expected_outcome: The times are cross-referenced, and the duration of the delay is confirmed.

tasks.description: Calculate the demurrage payment owed based on the verified delay time and the charter party's agreed-upon daily rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct payment amount is calculated and approved for settlement.
